text: Paul Heron Robinson Jr. (born June 22, 1930) is an American businessman and politician. He was born in Chicago, Illinois. Robinson Jr., a Republican, was United States Ambassador to Canada from 1981 to 1985 during the Ronald Reagan presidency. ==References== ==Other websites== *NNDB Profile Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United States Category:Businesspeople from Chicago Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Paul H. Robinson Jr.
